rules_text: Whenever you cast an artifact spell, surveil 2. Then if a land card was put into your graveyard this way, you may return it to your hand.
notes:
https://www.artstation.com/artwork/q9ren


Alt_1:
Whenever you put a counter on _2 MV2 , look at the top card of your library. If it’s a land card, you may reveal it and put it into your hand. Then if that counter is different from another on cardname, you may put a land card from your hand onto the battlefield.


OG_1:
Was a reprint of Sarinth Steelseeker
